main.name: Brian WK Huffman
main.description: With thirteen years of hard work experience in reputable kitchens throughout Oahu, I am now looking to pursue a career within tech
main.bio: Hard working, passionate individual with a strong innate desire to learn and grow within the tech industry. With years of hardships and experience working in fast paced environments I have never been a stranger to hard work.

education.description: Students develop hands-on experience in frameworks like Angular, React, and Node, as well as managing version control in Git, wrangling the command line terminal and deploying using AWS.

work.title: Key Employee/Kitchen Manager
work.description: Maintain a strong, positive relationship with managenent team. Inventory logging/Sales reporting. Manage & oversee BOH during service. Work as a team efficiently, effectively to produce quality products. Knowledge of proper food handling/sanitization as well as restaraunt recipes. Handle high volume work load.

work.title: Lead Banquet Cook
work.description: Ordering of food products. Accurately calculate food cost to make quotas. Ensure family standards are always met.

work.title: Prep/Line Cook
work.description: Keep friendly attitude in an open kitchen. Use and maintain restaraunt equipment BoH equipment. Learn new techniques quickly/efficiently.

quotes.text: No matter how dark the night, the morning always comes.
